annotation.name: org.alljoyn.Bus.DocString.En
annotation.value: This interface is for controlling wind direction of a device.

annotation.name: org.alljoyn.Bus.DocString.En
annotation.value: Horizontal wind direction of a device.

annotation.name: org.alljoyn.Bus.DocString.En
annotation.value: Maximum value allowed for a target horizontal wind direction.

annotation.name: org.alljoyn.Bus.DocString.En
annotation.value: Represent enabled/disabled state of the horizontal auto mode. HorizontalAutoMode is for controlling horizontal wind direction automatically.

annotation.name: org.alljoyn.Bus.DocString.En
annotation.value: Vertical wind direction of a device.

annotation.name: org.alljoyn.Bus.DocString.En
annotation.value: Maximum value allowed for a target vertical wind direction.

annotation.name: org.alljoyn.Bus.DocString.En
annotation.value: Represent enabled/disabled state of the vertical auto mode. VerticalAutoMode is for controlling vertical wind direction automatically.
